name: Finding Eric
description:
Story:
SCPs from different places mentioned their owner Eric, who is Eric? Where is Eric? Will Eric be found in the end?

How to Play:
1. Use the mouse to click items in the room and choose among the options.
2. Press Esc to return to the title screen if you already started the game.

Feedback Form:
Welcome to fill out the feedback form:
https://forms.gle/fmThJC1a3RqbG4ER7
